chart_description: This chart shows the extent cache memory usage in bytes for the Netdata dbengine extent cache family

dimension_descriptions.clean: The amount of memory used by clean extents that do not need to be flushed to disk
dimension_descriptions.free: The amount of memory available for a new extent to be created or to be used by existing dirty extents
dimension_descriptions.index: The amount of memory used by index nodes to locate data extents
